General.Name: Funkwerk AG
General.Description: Funkwerk AG develops and sells communication, information, and security systems worldwide. It provides train radio systems, including cab radio systems, ETCS data radio, data radio, handhelds, analogue radio, datasheets, TETRA train radio systems, and test equipment; LTE voice radio systems; visual and acoustic passenger information systems, such as FIA, CURA, accessibility, and monitors, displays and columns, as well as equipment and services; public address systems; and physical security information management systems. The company also offers video systems comprising camera systems and accessories, IP-pan/tilt head systems, professional video components, video management software, video technology solutions, and data sheets. In addition, it provides engineering, documentation, maintenance and servicing, support, repair, on call, and training services, as well as replacement parts management for the communication, information, and video systems. Funkwerk AG offers its products and services in the fields of railways, rail vehicles, public transport infrastructures, public and rail transit, industrials, areas, buildings, energy and supplies, authorities and judiciary, healthcare, and city and recreational facilities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kölleda, Germany. Funkwerk AG is a subsidiary of Hörmann Industries GmbH.
